casebody.data:
Russ Carroll BRYAN
v.
Suzanne DAILEY No. 249P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Michael P. Kepley, Attorney at Law, K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Bryan, Russ Carroll. LeeAnne Quattrucci, Attorney at Law, for Dailey, Suzanne.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of August 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
